choices.text:
Below is an instruction that describes a task. Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

### Instruction:
when I was 6, my sister was half my age. Now I am 80. How old is my sister now?

### Response:

When you were 6 years old, your sister was (6 - 3) = 3 years old. This means that she was half of your age at the time, which is a common way to determine someone's age in relation to another person's age.

Fast forward to now, when you are 80 years old. Your sister would be (80 - 3) = 77 years old. This is because she has aged at the same rate as you since you were both 6 years old.

Therefore, your sister is currently 77 years old.
